de.freinsberg.pomecaloco

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • de.freinsberg.pomecaloco.DBHelper

  • public class DBHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class represents the database including the databasescheme, methods and testdata.
    Author:
    freinsberg

      • openDB

        public void openDB()
        This method is used to open the database connection. the running database gets assigned to be writable.

      • createPlayer

        public void createPlayer(java.lang.String name)
        This Method creates a player in the player-table.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player to be inserted into the database.

      • createRoundGhost

        public boolean createRoundGhost(java.lang.String name,
                       int rounds,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> timesList,
                       java.lang.String total_time)
        This Method creates a new ghost in Roundmode for the given value combination.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the track.
        rounds - How many round have been set for the race.
        timesList - A list of the calculated round times.
        total_time - The total time the ghost has needed.
        Returns:
        true if Roundghost has been successfully stored into the database, false if not.

      • createTimeGhost

        public boolean createTimeGhost(java.lang.String name,
                      int time,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> timesList,
                      int total_rounds)
        This Method creates a new ghost in Timermode for the given value combination.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the track.
        time - How many minutes have been set for the race.
        timesList - A list of the calculated round times.
        total_rounds - How many round have been completed.
        Returns:
        true if Timerghost has been successfully stored into the database, false if not.

      • getRoundGhostTotalTime

        public java.lang.String getRoundGhostTotalTime(java.lang.String name,
                                      int rounds)
        Gets the total_time of a Roundghost for the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the track.
        rounds - The number of round the ghost has been stored with.
        Returns:
        The total_time.

      • getTimeGhostRounds

        public int getTimeGhostRounds(java.lang.String name,
                     int time)
        Gets the total_rounds of a Timerghost for the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Track.
        time - The amount of minutes the ghost has been stores with.
        Returns:
        The number of rounds.

      • createPlayerTrack

        public void createPlayerTrack(java.lang.String playername,
                     java.lang.String trackname,
                     int mode,
                     boolean win,
                     java.lang.String fastestround,
                     float averagespeed,
                     float drivenmeters)
        This method has only to be called when the method isPlayerTrackPresent() returns false. Creates and stores a new dataset for a combination of player-track-mode into the database. *
        Parameters:
        playername - The name of the player.
        trackname - The name of the track.
        mode - The racemode (roundmode or rimermode).
        win - Did this player win the race ?
        fastestround - The fastest round in this race.
        averagespeed - The average speed in this race.
        drivenmeters - The driven meters in this race.

      • getAllTracksWithImages

        public java.util.ArrayList<Pair<java.lang.String,byte[]>> getAllTracksWithImages()
        This Method returns all tracks with its images.
        Returns:
        All pairs of track and image.

      • getTrackLength

        public float getTrackLength(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the track length in meters.
        Parameters:
        name - The track which length is needed.
        Returns:
        The track length in meters.

      • getAllPlayernames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllPlayernames()
        This method gets all names of the stored players in the player-table.
        Returns:
        A list of all found player names.

      • isPlayerPresent

        public boolean isPlayerPresent(java.lang.String name)
        This method checks if a player is present in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player to be searched.
        Returns:
        true If a player with the given name is present in the player-table, false if not.

      • isPlayerTrackPresent

        public boolean isPlayerTrackPresent(java.lang.String player,
                           java.lang.String track,
                           int mode)
        This method has to be called before createPlayerTrack() is been called. It checks if a dataset for the given combination of player, track, and mode is created before and is available in the database.
        Parameters:
        player - The player name.
        track - The track name.
        mode - The Racemode.
        Returns:
        true, if a dataset for this combination has been found in the database, false if not.

      • getResultSet

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getResultSet(java.lang.String player,
                                                 java.lang.String track,
                                                 int mode)
        Gets a result set for a given combination of the player, the track and the racemode.
        Parameters:
        player - The player name.
        track - The track name.
        mode - The racemode (roundmode or timermode).
        Returns:
        The resultset including the values: attempt, wins, fastest round, last average speed, whole average speed an last driven meters. They are stored with a description at the first place following the value in the array list.

      • getPlayerLifetimeMeters

        public float getPlayerLifetimeMeters(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the total meters a player has been driven.
        Parameters:
        name - The player name
        Returns:
        The total meters in meters.

      • isRoundGhostPresent

        public boolean isRoundGhostPresent(java.lang.String name,
                          int rounds)
        Checks, if a roundghost with the given parameters has been stored into the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The track name.
        rounds - The rounds the ghost has been stored with.
        Returns:
        true If a ghost has been found in the database, false if not.

      • isTimeGhostPresent

        public boolean isTimeGhostPresent(java.lang.String track,
                         int time)
        Checks, if a timerghost with the given parameters has been stored into the database.
        Parameters:
        track - The track name.
        time - The number of minutes the ghost has been stored with.
        Returns:
        true If a ghost has been found in the database, false if not.

      • getRoundGhost

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRoundGhost(java.lang.String track,
                                                  int rounds)
        This method gets a roundghost out of the database.
        Parameters:
        track - The track name.
        rounds - The number of rounds that have been stored with the ghost.
        Returns:
        A list of the round_times represented as a String Array.

      • getTimeGhost

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTimeGhost(java.lang.String name,
                                                 int time)
        This method gets a timerghost out of the database.
        Parameters:
        name - The track name.
        time - The number of minutes that have been stored with the ghost.
        Returns:

      • updatePlayerStats

        public void updatePlayerStats(java.lang.String player,
                     java.lang.String track,
                     int mode,
                     boolean win,
                     java.lang.String fastestround,
                     float avgspeed,
                     float drivenmeters)
        This method has only to be called when the method isPlayerTrackPresent() returns true. The player-track-mode dataset is been updated with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        player - The player name.
        track - The track name.
        mode - The racemode (roundmode oder timermode).
        win - Did the player win the race?
        fastestround - The fastest round the player has driven in the race.
        avgspeed - The average speed the player has driven in the race.
        drivenmeters - The driven meters the player has driven in the race.

      • getPlayerTrackAttempt

        public int getPlayerTrackAttempt(java.lang.String player,
                        java.lang.String track,
                        int mode)
        Gets the attempt the player made on the combination of player-track-mode.
        Parameters:
        player - The player name.
        track - THe track name.
        mode - The racemode (roundmode or timermode)
        Returns:
        The attempt as a decimal number.

      • getPlayerTrackWins

        public int getPlayerTrackWins(java.lang.String player,
                     java.lang.String track,
                     int mode)
        Gets the wins the player made on the combination of player-track-mode.
        Parameters:
        player - The player name.
        track - The track name.
        mode - The racemode(roundmode or timermode).
        Returns:
        The wins as a decimal number.

      • getPlayerTrackWholeDrivenMeters

        public float getPlayerTrackWholeDrivenMeters(java.lang.String player,
                                    java.lang.String track,
                                    int mode)
        Gets the whole meters the player has driven on the combination of player-track-mode.
        Parameters:
        player - The player name.
        track - The track name.
        mode - The racemode (roundmode or timermode)
        Returns:
        The whole driven meters in meters.

      • getPlayerTrackWholeAverageSpeed

        public float getPlayerTrackWholeAverageSpeed(java.lang.String player,
                                    java.lang.String track,
                                    int mode)
        Gets the whole average speed the player did in all races in combination of player-track-mode.
        Parameters:
        player - The player name.
        track - The track name.
        mode - The racemode(roundmode or timermode).
        Returns:
        The whole average speed as a floating point number.
